review.reviewBody: So good,fresh, exactly what I was craving!
Worst chicken ever had..Chicken looks like cooked the day before and French fries too...Popcorn chicken was Okie to an extent which is reason for one star here..
it be great for some ketchup packaging, but good food!
Too much salt on chicken and no salt on fries
the individual gravy is really small for a price of 2.29 and i think its not worth it. the chickens has gotten really skinnier as well for the price you pay.
